title: How to implement mental health education in school - Quora

response.answer_text: 24.10.2020 Hello Implementing mental health education in school in India is a very difficult proposition. Permissions from our government education and health ministeries will have to be obtained. The mental health education subject material will have to be approved by the ministeries. Then approval of the parents of the students will have to be taken. Mental health being a stigma subject it's possible there can be opposition from the parents. All the best.
